actions.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read twice. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 623.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Financial Institutions Supervision, Regulation and Insurance

official_title: A bill to make technical corrections to the International Banking Act of 1978.

summary.text: Amends the International Banking Act of 1978 to specify that the requirement that foreign banks must establish U.S. subsidiaries (as opposed to direct branches) to accept or maintain deposits under $100,000 requiring insurance applies only to domestic retail deposits.

titles.title: A bill to make technical corrections to the International Banking Act of 1978.
